attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to petition against the closure of Jodrell Bank-Cheshire.
As a member of local Astronomy Society i think this WILL BE a step in the wrong direction for Science and Educational Studies of the Celestial heavens.
Heavens above ...money has already been spent- meagre 2.5m is a drop in the ocean!

rejection.details: Please make the title of the petition a call to action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
